post.author: 부기흡

comment.author: 오승준
comment.content: 죄송..전 선약이 있어서 참석 못합니다..많은분들이 참석했으면 좋겠네요.

comment.author: 김형태
comment.content: 에고, 오늘 아침까진 가능했는데... 회장님 예상했던 그 모임 땜에 몬 갑니다. 어떻게 시간까지 똑같을 수가... 다음 번엔 꼭 가죠. ^^

comment.author: 오주환
comment.content: 선약이 취소되어서 갈 수 있을 것 같습니다. 너무 늦게 답변드려서 죄송합니다.

post.content:
Hi all,

There is an AKCSE (The Association of Korean-Canadian Scientists and Engineers <www.akcse.org>) picnic on Aug. 27th. I encourage our active members to join this event as many as possible.

Please let me know (416-802-7155) and/or leave a comment (with your contact info) below if you (and your family) can come.

Thanks in advance.
- Kihup  

============================================
Dear Fellow Korean Scientists and Engineers,

I am pleased to invite you to the AKCSE summer picnic on August 27, 2005. The picnic will be as follows:

Location: Huron Park (Area C)

          830 Paisley Blvd. W.

          (between Queensway and Dundas St. W., West of Mavis)

Time:     11:00 AM – 3:00 PM on August 27, 2005 (Sat)

Fee:      Free provided that you are a member. If not, you can fill out a form on site.

          (I encourage you to become a member of AKCSE before you come. Visit www.akcse.org for more information).

Facility:

-        It is a VERY small park with a “water playground” for small kids. If the weather permits, please bring “swimming suits” for your kids.

Map: http://maps.google.ca/maps?q=830+Paiseley+Blvd.+Mississauga,+ON&spn=0.041184,0.075831&hl=en

** I would appreciate if

-        you would bring outdoor toys (balls, Frisbees, etc.) for kids.

-        You would let me know whether you would come or not.

-        You would share this information with other Korean fellows.

I hope to see you all at the picnic.

Thanks

Chi-Guhn
post.title: Join AKCSE picnic on 8/27
